mapper.insert: INSERT INTO isign_log_temp(uuid, dttm, temp_log_data, log_type) VALUES ( #{uuid}, #{dttm}, #{tempLogData}, #{logType})
mapper.select: select date_format(dttm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as LastLoginDate from isign_log_user where log_code = 102300 and user_id = #{userId} order by log_no desc limit 2
